channel.title: An error whilst running server
channel.description:
[code][client-1-ho]: Loading finished. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18178) at client.packetSending(client.java:18146) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:50) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player ello11111 ClientHandler: Client ello11111 disconnected. [client-1-ho]: Loading finished.[/code]
i dont know what this means but it kicked the player, can anyone help it would really be appreciated. thanks

item.title: An error whilst running server

@kickingjamie wrote:

okay ill try that thanks

item.title: An error whilst running server
item.dc:creator: @public_boolean public boolean
item.description:
@public_boolean wrote:

Ok, the player must of gone into a certain area which was out of bounds, that happens.
Look in your player.java, something up in there.

Read full topic

item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

i didnt kick anyone it just randomly came up. and i wasnt even playing the server.

item.description:

So when you kicked this person from the server did you Disconnect?
